sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_ID, B.REQ_NM, B.USE_CD AS REQ_USE_CD, A.REQ_CHG_ID, A.REQ_CHG_TYPE_CD, SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(A.LIC_GRP_ID, 'REQ00005', A.REQ_CHG_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REQ_CHG_TYPE_NM, A.CHG_USR_ID, I.USR_NM AS CHG_USR_NM, I.EMAIL AS CHG_USR_EMAIL, I.USR_IMG_ID AS CHG_USR_IMG_ID, I.BLOCK AS CHG_USR_BLOCK, I.USE_CD AS CHG_USR_USE_CD, I.DEL_CD AS CHG_USR_DEL_CD, A.CHG_DTM, A.PRE_PROCESS_ID, C.PROCESS_NM AS PRE_PROCESS_NM, C.USE_CD AS PRE_PROCESS_USE_CD, C.DEL_CD AS PRE_PROCESS_DEL_CD, A.CHG_PROCESS_ID, D.PROCESS_NM AS CHG_PROCESS_NM, D.USE_CD AS CHG_PROCESS_USE_CD, D.DEL_CD AS CHG_PROCESS_DEL_CD, A.PRE_FLOW_ID, E.FLOW_NM AS PRE_FLOW_NM, E.FLOW_TITLE_BG_COLOR AS PRE_FLOW_TITLE_BG_COLOR, E.FLOW_TITLE_COLOR AS PRE_FLOW_TITLE_COLOR, E.USE_CD AS PRE_FLOW_USE_CD, E.FLOW_START_CD AS PRE_FLOW_START_CD, E.FLOW_DONE_CD AS PRE_FLOW_DONE_CD, A.CHG_FLOW_ID, F.FLOW_NM AS CHG_FLOW_NM, F.USE_CD AS CHG_FLOW_USE_CD, F.FLOW_TITLE_BG_COLOR AS CHG_FLOW_TITLE_BG_COLOR, F.FLOW_TITLE_COLOR AS CHG_FLOW_TITLE_COLOR, F.FLOW_START_CD AS CHG_FLOW_START_CD, F.FLOW_DONE_CD AS CHG_FLOW_DONE_CD, A.PRE_CHARGER_ID, G.USR_NM AS PRE_CHARGER_NM, G.EMAIL AS PRE_CHARGER_EMAIL, G.USR_IMG_ID AS PRE_CHARGER_IMG_ID, G.BLOCK AS PRE_USR_BLOCK, G.USE_CD AS PRE_USR_USE_CD, G.DEL_CD AS PRE_USR_DEL_CD, A.CHG_CHARGER_ID, H.USR_NM AS CHG_CHARGER_NM, H.EMAIL AS CHG_CHARGER_EMAIL, H.USR_IMG_ID AS CHG_CHARGER_IMG_ID, H.BLOCK AS CHG_USR_BLOCK, H.USE_CD AS CHG_USR_USE_CD, H.DEL_CD AS CHG_USR_DEL_CD, A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP FROM REQ6001 A INNER JOIN REQ4100 B ON ( B.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND B.REQ_ID = A.REQ_ID AND B.USE_CD = '01' ) LEFT JOIN PRJ1100 C ON ( C.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND C.PROCESS_ID = A.PRE_PROCESS_ID AND C.DEL_CD = '02') LEFT JOIN PRJ1100 D ON ( D.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND D.PROCESS_ID = A.CHG_PROCESS_ID AND D.DEL_CD = '02') LEFT JOIN PRJ1101 E ON ( E.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND E.PROCESS_ID = A.PRE_PROCESS_ID AND E.FLOW_ID = A.PRE_FLOW_ID AND E.USE_CD = '01') LEFT JOIN PRJ1101 F ON ( F.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND F.PROCESS_ID = A.CHG_PROCESS_ID AND F.FLOW_ID = A.CHG_FLOW_ID AND F.USE_CD = '01') LEFT JOIN STM3000 G ON ( G.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND G.USR_ID = A.PRE_CHARGER_ID ) LEFT JOIN STM3000 H ON ( H.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND H.USR_ID = A.CHG_CHARGER_ID ) LEFT JOIN STM3000 I ON ( I.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND I.USR_ID = A.CHG_USR_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
ORDER BY A.CHG_DTM
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_REQ_CHG_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_REQ_CHG_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_REQ_CHG_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(REQ_CHG_ID) AS NEW_REQ_CHG_ID FROM REQ6001 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.REQ_CHG_ID LIKE 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO REQ6001 A ( A.LIC_GRP_ID, A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_ID, A.REQ_CHG_ID ,A.REQ_CHG_TYPE_CD, A.CHG_USR_ID, A.CHG_DTM, A.PRE_PROCESS_ID ,A.CHG_PROCESS_ID, A.PRE_FLOW_ID, A.CHG_FLOW_ID ,A.PRE_CHARGER_ID, A.CHG_CHARGER_ID ,A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #prjId#, #reqId#, #newReqChgId# ,#reqChgTypeCd#, #chgUsrId#, SYSDATE, #preProcessId# ,#chgProcessId#, #preFlowId#, #chgFlowId# ,#preChargerId#, #chgChargerId# ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM REQ6001 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
